createtable: CREATE TABLE `?` (`username` varchar(100) NOT NULL,`nickname` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,`point` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`rank` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL,`timeline` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`username`)) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
creategameroom: CREATE TABLE `gameroom` (`appcode` varchar(100) NOT NULL,`roominfo` text,`timeline` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`appcode`)) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
updateuser: update from ? set nickname = ?,point =?,rank = ?,timeline =? where username=?
updateuserpoint: update from ? set point =?,rank = ?,timeline =? where username=?
updateroomlist: update gameroom set roominfo = ?, timeline= ? where appcode=?
